title: SeeBiscuit
author: SeeBiscuit
created_time: February 05, 2023, 01:48:17 PMLast edit: May 08, 2024, 08:54:13 AM by SeeBiscuit

comments.author: mendace
comments.body: I think all the applications you mentioned except this forum literally creep me out.  How can anyone talk about the best bank on a Bitcoin forum that should be the cover to financial freedom?  How can you recommend Discord which is a centralized server to the detriment of many other p2p anonymous services?  I really hope your example is not accepted.
